rules.natural: If the City Council receives funding for the Conservation Program, then Urban Wildlife achieves conservation goals through the Initiative

Either the Community Group organizes volunteers for the Monitoring Program, or if Urban Wildlife does not achieve conservation goals through the Initiative, then the Conservation Team implements an emergency plan for Habitat Crisis
Either the Research Team analyzes data from Camera Footage or the Research Team publishes findings on Urban Ecology
If the Research Team publishes findings on Urban Ecology, then either the Research Team installs cameras for Wildlife Monitoring or Urban Wildlife achieves conservation goals through the Initiative

If the Conservation Team launches an awareness campaign for Public Education, then should the Research Team analyze data from Camera Footage, it follows that either the Research Team installs cameras for Wildlife Monitoring or Urban Wildlife achieves conservation goals through the Initiative
If the Education Team develops curriculum for Wildlife Conservation, then the Conservation Team partners with schools for the Youth Program
Either the Education Team develops curriculum for Wildlife Conservation or the Conservation Team hosts workshops for Community Engagement
If the Conservation Team hosts workshops for Community Engagement, then the Conservation Team distributes materials for Educational Resources
If the Conservation Team distributes materials for Educational Resources, then the Conservation Team launches an awareness campaign for Public Education
If the Wildlife Foundation receives funding for the Conservation Program, then Urban Wildlife achieves conservation goals through the Initiative
If Park Services allocates resources for Habitat Management, then provided that Park Services maintains habitats in Green Spaces, Urban Wildlife achieves conservation goals through the Initiative

Either Local Residents oppose development of the Construction Project, or the City Council receives funding for the Conservation Program, or the Wildlife Foundation receives funding for the Conservation Program
If the Business Association supports conservation of the Wildlife Plan, then Local Residents do not oppose development of the Construction Project
Either the Business Association supports conservation of the Wildlife Plan or the Development Firm proposes compromise on the Modified Project
If the Development Firm proposes compromise on the Modified Project, then the Development Firm includes green spaces in the Building Design
If the Development Firm includes green spaces in the Building Design, then Local Residents do not oppose development of the Construction Project
Either the Transport Department monitors vehicle collisions at Wildlife Crossings or the Transport Department installs warning signs for Animal Crossing
If the Transport Department installs warning signs for Animal Crossing, then Urban Wildlife achieves conservation goals through the Initiative
If the University receives grant for Research Funding, then the Research Team studies migration patterns of Wildlife Movement
Either the University receives grant for Research Funding or the University collaborates on research with the Conservation Team

If the University collaborates on research with the Conservation Team, then under the condition that the Transport Department monitors vehicle collisions at Wildlife Crossings, the Conservation Team establishes protocol for Animal Rescue
If City Planning approves permits for Wildlife Corridors, then the Research Team conducts a survey of Urban Foxes
Either City Planning approves permits for Wildlife Corridors or the Environmental Agency approves permits for Wildlife Corridors

If the Environmental Agency approves permits for Wildlife Corridors, then either the City Council receives funding for the Conservation Program or the Wildlife Foundation receives funding for the Conservation Program

If the Research Team conducts a survey of Urban Foxes, then either the City Council receives funding for the Conservation Program or the Wildlife Foundation receives funding for the Conservation Program
If the Conservation Team trains staff in Rescue Procedures, then the Conservation Team establishes protocol for Animal Rescue
Either the Conservation Team trains staff in Rescue Procedures or the Conservation Team hires a veterinarian for Wildlife Care
If the Conservation Team hires a veterinarian for Wildlife Care, then Urban Wildlife achieves conservation goals through the Initiative
